extends java.lang.Object

      • findAddon

        @Nullable
public GriffonAddon findAddon(@Nonnull
                                        java.lang.String name)
        Description copied from interface: AddonManager
        Finds an addon by name.

        Example: findAddon("miglayout") will return a GriffonAddon that represents the contributions of the MigLayout plugin.

        Specified by:
        findAddon in interface AddonManager
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the addon to search for
        Returns:
        an addon instance if there's a match, null otherwise
